events.message: I have just been involved in a car collision and need to file a claim immediately due to the damage.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and damage details.
An agent has been assigned to assist with your vehicle accident claim to ensure smooth processing.
We have officially acknowledged the receipt of your auto accident claim and started our record keeping.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage and the police accident report to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including photos and the accident report, have been submitted within the given deadline.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence related to your car collision.
The investigation into your vehicle accident claim is now complete; findings are being reviewed.
We have proposed a settlement offer based on the assessment report and damage valuation.
Customer has provided feedback on the proposed settlement, requesting clarification on coverage details.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following successful review and customer response.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued and should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
The claim documents and case files have been archived securely for future reference and record keeping.
